long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes words to sound more feminine - history becomes herstory, legacy becomes legashe. Inspired by the Simpsons, this is an extension for women who want to breastfeed their own dreams!
